text: Cold Bay is a town in Alaska, United States. The town name is Udaamagax in the Aleut language. As of the 2020 census, the population was 50. Cold Bay is one of the main commercial centers of the Alaska Peninsula. It is home to Cold Bay Airport. The offices for Izembek National Wildlife Refuge are also in the town. ==References== Category:Cities in Alaska
title: Cold Bay, Alaska
